results.content:
The instructor had a thorough understanding of the material. However the quality of the video and audio was bad, and the instructor seemed like he was rushing. Course was very outdated and much of it no longer applies.

As a suggestion to Udemy, you really should show publish dates and last modified dates for courses.

results.content: Content seems out of date since some features from the Browser Dev Tools I find them differently. Also, some screens showed on the course are zoom in and the responses given are out of scope so the instructor keeps talking but doesn't show what he is talking about

results.content: Firebug is not compatible with Quantum which renders a large portion of this class obsolete. I personally do not have much use for Internet Explorer.
